title: Episode 604, "FehFehFeh Tale"
author: The One Piece Podcast (Zach, Ed, Steve, with guests Crystalyn Hodgkins and Kelly)
description: The One Piece Podcast discusses episode 604 of the anime, covering the Straw Hats' infiltration of the laboratory, Law's escape plan, and the debut of Gomu Gomu no UFO. Special guests include Crystalyn Hodgkins (Managing Editor for Anime News Network) and Kelly.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discussion covers episode 604 events and some broader Punk Hazard arc context

title: 603-604: Launching the Counter Attack! Luffy and Law's Great Escape! and Get to Building R! The Pirate Alliance's Great Advance!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr Blog)
description: A detailed recap and analysis of episodes 603-604, focusing on the Straw Hats' escape plan, the alliance dynamics, and Zoro's warning to Luffy about New World dangers. The post examines character development and thematic elements of cooperation between pirates and marines.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains context from the full Punk Hazard arc

title: One Piece Episode 604 Arc Punk Hazard
author: Various TikTok Creators
description: Collection of TikTok videos discussing and showing clips from One Piece episode 604, including reactions to Gomu Gomu no UFO, analysis of the Punk Hazard escape sequence, and commentary on the pirate-marine alliance.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Various clips and discussions of episode 604

title: One Piece - Luffy Gomu Gomu no UFO - Funny (Episode 604)
author: MakeAGif User
description: Animated GIF capturing Luffy's Gomu Gomu no UFO technique from episode 604, showing him spinning his legs like helicopter blades.

title: Episode 604 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for episode 604 including plot summary, character appearances, debut information, manga chapters covered, production credits, and trivia.

title: One Piece: Punk Hazard (575-629) Episode 604 - Get to Building R! The Pirate Alliance's Great Advance!
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official Crunchyroll streaming page for One Piece episode 604, featuring the simulcast version with English subtitles.

title: One Piece Episode #604 Anime Review
author: Fandom Post
description: Professional anime review of episode 604, discussing the pacing, character development, and how the episode serves as a transition phase in the Punk Hazard arc. Notes that Luffy shows growth as a captain and the episode moves subplots forward under the cloak of action.

title: "One Piece" Mezase R-tou! Kaizoku Doumei Kaishingeki! (TV Episode 2013)
author: IMDb Contributors
description: IMDb page for episode 604 with rating (7.5/10 based on 780 votes), plot summary, cast and crew information, and user reviews.

title: One Piece Episodes 625, 628-629: End of the Punk Hazard Arc
author: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
description: Podcast discussing the end of the Punk Hazard arc, with retrospective analysis that includes context from earlier episodes like 604 and the escape plan through Building R.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses full Punk Hazard arc including ending
